title: Open Telemetry Standard
description: A schema to validate against the Open Motion Alliance standard

schema.description: URI of schema version used for this data

timestamp.description: Current timestamp of the game session, for motion software plugin to know order of packets

gameName.description: Name of game that is outputting this data

maxSampleRate.description: Maximum samples per minute motion software plugin can poll at

motionObject.description: Object that defines movement of simulator

objectName.description: Name of motionObject, every instance should be unique per game to allow for motion profile tweaking

objectLocation.description: Name of location within game. eg. place, airport code, track name

objectType.description: Type of object. eg. aircraft, atv, boat, helicopter, hovercraft, motorcycle, spacecraft, submersible, tank, terrestrial, train, truck
objectType.$comment: TODO: define allowed values using enum? https://json-schema.org/understanding-json-schema/reference/enum

rotationX.$comment: TODO: validate radians is best unit

rotationY.$comment: TODO: validate radians is best unit

rotationZ.$comment: TODO: validate radians is best unit

drag_coefficient.description: A measure of the drag force experienced by an object moving through a fluid, such as air or water. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Drag_coefficient

lift_coefficient.description: A measure of the lift force generated by an object, such as an airfoil or a wing, as it moves through a fluid, typically air. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lift_coefficient

yaw_moment_coefficient.description: A measure of the aerodynamic forces that cause a rotating object, such as an aircraft or a vehicle, to yaw or rotate about its vertical axis. It quantifies the effectiveness of the object's aerodynamic surfaces in producing a yawing moment. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Aircraft_flight_dynamics

feedbackItems.description: An array of feedbackItem objects, display readouts etc

name.description: Name of drivepoint, must be unique per motionObject

type.description: type of drivepoint, eg. wheel, propeller, jet, track, sail, waterjet, leg

currentTerrain.description: Name of current terrain type this drivepoint is in contact with
currentTerrain.$comment: TODO: define allowed list of types.. atmosphere, asphalt, dirt, rumble strip, gas, liquid, solid

cogOffsetX.description: Position offset of drivepoint in relation to centre of gravity

cogOffsetY.description: Position offset of drivepoint in relation to centre of gravity

cogOffsetZ.description: Position offset of drivepoint in relation to centre of gravity

travelX.description: Array representing travel and resistance from the defined offset point. Travel measured in meters as two floating-point numbers, positive and negative movement distance. Stiffness is represented as a floating-point number in N/m of force required to produce a unit displacement.

travelY.description: Array representing travel and resistance from the defined offset point. Travel measured in meters as two floating-point numbers, positive and negative movement distance. Stiffness is represented as a floating-point number in N/m of force required to produce a unit displacement.

travelZ.description: Array representing travel and resistance from the defined offset point. Travel measured in meters as two floating-point numbers, positive and negative movement distance. Stiffness is represented as a floating-point number in N/m of force required to produce a unit displacement.

type.description: datatype of feedbackItem value field (boolean, integer, number, string)

unit.description: Measurment unit of value key. eg mm, cm, bar, m/s, percentage etc
